content: and pick up 1 on round 16 work first 7 stitches first with waste yarn then in stitch from backwards loop cast on you may want to also pick pattern you will come back to this later for afterthought thumb up one stitch on either side of this one then immediately after working last round of chart graft together remaining decrease 2 stitches on the first round this helps close any gaps stitches at the base of thumb work thumb on these 14 stitches with mc for 16 row or until carefully remove waste yarn while picking up 7 stitches above desired length is reached it should be just past tip of thumb and below 14 stitches next k1 k2tog 4x 7 stitches work thumb with mc for 16 row or until desired length is thread yarn through remaining stitches and pull tight reached it should be just past tip of thumb next k1 k2tog 4x 7 stitches work 2nd mitten the same way except working chart a and thread yarn through remaining stitches and pull tight chart c left hand on all stitches work 2nd mitten the same way except put the *last* 7 stitches finishing of the first repeat of the chart on waste yarn weave in ends block and enjoy by alice glass of three eye cat knits chart a chart b right hand by alice glass of three eye cat knits uncle bernie s upcycled mittens this pattern is for personal use only please do not reproduce or sell this pattern or any products made from it pattern by alice glass of three eye cat ravelry threeeyecat instagram @threeeyecat email threeeyecatshop@gmail com version 2 january 25 2021
